name: Pocket Edition Guides for Mods & Maps for Minecraft
name_original: Pocket Edition Guides for Mods & Maps for Minecraft
description:
ULTIMATE GUIDES, TUTORIALS & CHEATS FOR THE BEST MODS FROM MINECRAFT

Some of the features:
- Guides, Tutorials, Videos, Strategies
- Fun Camera with MC elements(take photos of yourself in minecraft world)
- Quizes / Trivia
- Exp calc
- Tips
- Tutorials
- Emc values
- Maps (seeds)
- Walkthroughs, tutorials, items, video tips, strategies to beat your friends and more.
- Game center integrated for Trivia - compete with others

Guides & Tutorials for selected MODS:
Aether
Divine RPG
Industrial Craft 2
BuildCraft
Equivalent Exchange
RedPower 2
Railcraft
Forestry
Mo' Creatures
Farming Cart
Hexxit
Thaumcraft
Pixelmon
Biomes O' Plenty
Galacticraft
The Chocolate Quest
Bibliocraft
Balkon's WeaponMod

ADDITIONAL BONUS:
+ All EMC values
+ Experience calculator
+ Tips
+ Minecraft Trivia quiz
+ Tekkit quiz

Universal app app for iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad
***
This app will help you with mods in Minecraft without having to get out of Minecraft. You can look on your iPhone/iPad/iPod and learn what is what for and how you get it.
***
"Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB. This unofficial app is only a reference guide for mods in Minecraft.
